thread.title: Bigg Boss: NC Aiyappa gives red roses to Shruthi
thread.title_full: Bigg Boss: NC Aiyappa gives red roses to Shruthi - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Bigg Boss: NC Aiyappa gives red roses to Shruthi
text:
The launch of third instalment of Bigg Boss was an eventful occasion. In the action-packed episode, viewers were introduced to all the inmates, who were a mystery till now.
Only interesting twist was when host Sudeep handed out a bouquet of red roses to cricketer NC Aiyappa and dancer Jayashree. They were asked to give it to any inmate of their choosing. Both Aiyappa and Jayashree played it safe; while Aiyappa gave the bouquet to Shruthi, Jayashree gave it to Huccha Venkat.
